attributes.action: Review the quality of healthcare for women with endometriosis.
attributes.additional_details: It takes on average 7 years for a diagnosis. Suffering and waiting so long for help and treatment isn’t fair on any women, more so those who can’t afford private health care
attributes.background: I want the government to review the quality of health care for patients with endometriosis.

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petition open on a similar topic which you might like to sign:

Fund more research into diagnosis and treatment of women’s health conditions
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610170
